conversation_history.content: Act as if you are the human user of an AI application, and I am your AI assistant. Please prompt me with one clear, super short sentence in colloquial language, without greetings or compliments!
Scours the crypto landscape. TrenchTrader also helps you create working wallets and mint your own memecoins. Use 'help' to see a list of commands.
What kind of wallet should I generate?
ü§î Sorry, I didn‚Äôt understand. Try `help` or ask about meme coins, whales, or trending.

üê≥ No whale buys detected right now.
